website_summaries.verdict: A fantastic choice for conditioning hair, moisturizing skin, and relieving aching joints, Pure Emu Oil is definitely worth the initial investment as an excellent all-natural skincare solution.
pros: Does not use antibiotics, hormones, or pesticides
cons: Although this genuine emu oil is high-quality, it is a pricy skincare product

customer_reviews.title: Great oil for your hair and under they eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. It’s done wonders for my hair and it’s a great moisturizer. This emu oil has made the hair in my crown and nape area a lot thicker and stronger. I also mix it with a couple drops of Ylang Ylang III essential oil and apply it under my eyes. Another plus is that you only need to apply a small amount each time you apply emu oil to your desired area. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Tierra Beloved

customer_reviews.title: Regrew my bald spot back
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think this was possible. I have been applying it to my bald spot for the past month now and my hair grew back. To be safe, I only get a 1 with my haircut for the fade because getting a 0 is what caused the bald spot. This was totally worth the money. Unfortunately I did not take a "before" pic before I started applying it. But it has grown back for sure and I'm no longer self-conscious about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: I use amitriptyline to get more stage 3 sleep, ...
customer_reviews.text: I use amitriptyline to get more stage 3 sleep, to make more growth hormone, to do daily muscle repair. (Amitriptyline is also a mast cell stabilzer. Study by team with Dr Theoharides). I was out of amitrip. for 3 days. This topical emu oil in the evening and before bed helped my pain. On day 3 I walked too much and numerous muscles began to spasm simultaneously. Emu oil stopped that. I did have a recurrence a little later, which emu oil stopped again. I reapplied before bed and slept pain free.
customer_reviews.author: Fibro patient blankname

customer_reviews.title: Emu oil works great for hair
customer_reviews.text: Emu oil has been beneficial in growing in my edges and thickening my hair.
customer_reviews.author: MissHowell1974

customer_reviews.title: It helps thinning edges when used regularly...
customer_reviews.text: My edges were thinning, so I searched around online and found that Emu oil seemed to help thinning edges recover. Initially I thought that this product did not work how I needed it to work, so I pushed it to the back of my cabinet along with the other products that I do not use regularly. It was not until 2 weeks ago that I pulled this product back out and started using it "regularly", 4 days a week, and I noticed results! The key here is to be consistent with the product, use it regularly. I just ordered another bottle ;)
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: Love This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my very sensitive scalp. It is very gentle and does not cause irritation. As a bonus, it also tends to make my hair very soft and easy to manage. It has a very mild scent; almost scentless. It is a very light-weight oil. A little goes a long way. I will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Ajedeja

customer_reviews.title: Smile lines disappearing!
customer_reviews.text: Ummmm... lines around my eyes? Not anymore, thank you! I've been 3-4 drops of this after face washing for about 4 months, and yesterday my teenage son said to me- "Did you get a peel or something?". Yup. That's all I needed. I'll keep buying forever. Soaks in quickly without looking oily, makes my makeup go on GREAT, my lines, acne scars, and some old pits are fading noticeably with each week of continued use. My smile lines look A LOT less noticeable too. I've turned ALL the women in my family onto emu oil for skincare- and my mom has reported catching my dad using it too!
customer_reviews.author: Nurse CW

customer_reviews.title: This lives up to its claim, but...
customer_reviews.text: This Emu oil is wonderfully slippery in application and then is absorbed and your skin feels so smooth. An added bonus: It has no discernible taste. I've tried so many lotions and potions over the years, but this brand of Emu oil is the best I've found. Unfortunately, the price jumped nearly $6.00 in just a couple of months! I've had to buy a different, less expensive brand.
customer_reviews.author: JACK BUTLER

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: You definitely notice the difference when you put the emu oil on your face, it is so moisturizing. I also notice I was getting a few bumps on my face from taking biotin and the first week the emu oil remove the bumps but after awhile they came back. But over all the emu oil works well. It makes your face feel nice and plum, and oh no smell to this product. I am definitely on a hair and face journey lol so I am watching those areas very closely, so I did notice a difference with using the emu oil within the first week. I like to see fast result and I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Sooo great, you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. It is soooo softening and moisturizing. No bad smell. Put it on your cuticles and it will make your nails shine like you painted them. I have heard people add this to their conditioner (just a drop or two) and use under their eyes. GREAT product!
customer_reviews.author: malcontent

customer_reviews.title: Not emu oil
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased emu oil before and this isn’t it. This product doesn’t even smell like anything and has a thick white consistency. Always be aware when you’re buying from amazon vendors. They’ll sell you spit in a water bottle and change the label. I wouldn’t recommend this product to a wild animal. It’s probably vitamin E oil with a new label. I’d rate 0 stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: Shanice Phillips

customer_reviews.title: The best ever
customer_reviews.text: HAVE LOVED THIS SINCE 2015. It has grown back hair that I’ve lost from stress and extensions. I also put this on my eyelash and use it on my skin! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel brockman

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work for me
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a few months and I have experienced some growth. I've combined this with the JBCO in an applicator bottle and apply it to my scalp nightly. I also use this mix for sealing after moisturizing. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Jubilant

customer_reviews.title: Emu Oil Is A Keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this natural oil because a blogger said it was good for thinning edges. I can honestly say it is working for me along with other natural oils, patience and consistently usage. I've already purchased a second bottle!
customer_reviews.author: T.A.F.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful healing therapeutic oil for skin ailments
customer_reviews.text: This oil, along with curcumin taken by mouth, worked to cure a diagnosed auto-immune skin condition. It also worked so well on my wrinkles, I wondered if there were botox in it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Horey

customer_reviews.title: No break outs. Just takes a drop.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful for fine lines and moisturising. Didnt make my sensitive skin break out!! Unethical harvesting tecniques so i wont be repurchasing but works good. Emus need their oil more than me.
customer_reviews.author: Paradise*Gardens

customer_reviews.title: a miracle oil
customer_reviews.text: I began using emu oil a couple of months ago. I read about it extensively online. I have RRMS that's relapsing-remitting multiple sclerosis. I suffer from pain, inflammation in different parts of my body, headaches, & I have visual disturbances as well. The Emmanuel is great for all of that. I cannot recommend this stuff enough. If you have questions please let me know and I'm happy to answer them if I can.
customer_reviews.author: Atlproctor

customer_reviews.title: I have heard about this product before. I started ...
customer_reviews.text: I have heard about this product before. I started to use it and it began to simulate hair growth around my hairline. I am looking forward to using all of the bottles I purchase to see how well my hair will grow. I will write a follow up review after two months of using the product.
customer_reviews.author: To tell the truth

customer_reviews.title: So Far, So Good!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried almost every natural remedy under the sun to help my son's mild eczema, with little to no success. The Emu Oil arrived yesterday and within a few hours of applying it, his skin was no longer dry and itchy. This morning was the first day he woke up without complaining of itching. Time will tell, but as of right now, I am very impressed. And for those who are wondering, this product is odorless. It also absorbs into the skin nicely, without a greasy feel.
customer_reviews.author: MTshopper

customer_reviews.title: Makes hair soft & manageable!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best brand of Emu oil I have ever used. Love It! It’s smooth with a nice scent and makes my hair soft and manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a bottle!
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the emu oil...I bought it to help grow in my hair, the thin spots but I also use it on my face, and on my seborrheic dermatitis! The back of my ear broke out, I put emu oil on it, the next day my ear wasn't sore, cracked, or oozing. It was a miracle! I also put it on my face and it leaves my skin feeling so soft! It's not greasy either! I will keep ordering this product! Oh, I forgot, my daughter suffers from eczema and I put it on some of her rashes, & they are starting to clear up.
customer_reviews.author: Myradvs

customer_reviews.title: So far loving it!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving this emu oil! It has a very good consistency, light smell that doesn't bother me at all, and goes on my face very smoothly. It has worked well on correcting breakout issues I had from using a cheap tca peel.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jessica

customer_reviews.title: I've used this many years ago and didn't realize the effect it has on fine hair. Great thickening agent and regrows edges quickl
customer_reviews.text: Staple product! I've used this many years ago and didn't realize the effect it has on fine hair. Great thickening agent and regrows edges quickly. I've returned to using this 2 months ago and can see results already!
customer_reviews.author: M. Patt

customer_reviews.title: Yeah, it's okay
customer_reviews.text: I rarely give only 3 stars in a product review - I guess I've been really lucky with most products I buy. I bought this after reading several reviews on how well it works. Frankly, I see no more improvement with my skin than when I was using regular baby oil (on my feet). They also say it can be used on your face. After using it for 2 weeks on my face at night, I went back to my usual routine. A good moisturizer mixed with one capsule of vitamin E. Maybe this will work better for you than it did me.
customer_reviews.author: Cissy  P

customer_reviews.title: This works just fine. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.text: This specific product lasted about 3 months of continuous use as my only moisturizer on a backpacking trip this fall. Can't say it's any better or worse than the other emu oils I've used. I like emu oil, a more lengthy statement about it is on another review i did in the past. I think it's excellent at healing skin.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best emu oil that I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best emu oil that I have ever tried. It's not greasy and it absorbed pretty fast. Doesn't really have much of a smell either and it's thick, like Jamaica black caster oil. However, for the price, I would have liked the bottle to be filled all the way to the top ( mine was almost 1/4 empty)
customer_reviews.author: yolanda smith

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC and have only had the Pure Emu Oil for ...
customer_reviews.text: STELLAR, FANTASTIC and have only had the Pure Emu Oil for 3 days. I'm really a hard sell , but this is repairing skin problems I have been fighting with for a couple of years. Extra Bonus is that wrinkles just seem to disappear, even the large ones. Certainly, it is more expensive than what I usually would purchase that is 'ALL natural", but whew......love this and I won't be without it. I didn't think anything could heal this much, this quickly, period. Thank you AMAZON!
customer_reviews.author: knitsensei

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Makes my hand feel like silk. You can use just a little and it does a great job moisturizing my skin. It' PERFECT for winter weather. I have been using it on my hair, but haven't seen growth yet, but it is amazing on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for results.
customer_reviews.text: This has a creamy texture and is odorless. I bought it to use on my thinning hair ro help regrow it. It's too soon to tell if it's working bit my hopes are good.
customer_reviews.author: angiedj

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It makes my skin so smooth and soft. Makeup goes on great and now i use it to help take makeup off and as a moisturizer before bed. It's saved me a mint in expensive night creams, that gave me less results in such a short time. Great for dry cuticles as well...and to put in your hair as a treatment, but only if you have DRY hair....love this stuff. Wish is traveled better though.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Emulicious
customer_reviews.text: Normally I purchase my Emu oil on my yearly road trip up the coast. This year I was unable to make my trip, and ran out of my oil. After reading a blog that suggested this oil as well as the amazon reviews I decided to purchase. The oil arrived quickly and was packaged professionally. My main uses for the oil are pain relief, to smooth my skin, and moisturize. The oil has been excellent for all uses! I will be purchasing again. On a side note this oil is priced very well.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product for skin
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time i have bought this for my scalp, it has helped my very dry skin and has helped a lot of old wounds. Best natural product so happy my friend showed me this, spread the word.
customer_reviews.author: Negin

customer_reviews.title: True healing product
customer_reviews.text: This Emu was essentially a blessing for my husband and I. I just purchased this product over a week now and we feel a tremendous difference in our skin. With both suffering severe dry skin scaring in skin healing and hair loss. It has done worked miracles. My husband is Alresdy asking is there a bigger bottle to purchase. But this product. You will not be disappointed. THE REAL DEAL!!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: allergic to this emu oil product
customer_reviews.text: I tried this product since I had used another emu oil and absolutely loved that product. Recently, I had noticed that my eyes were very itchy and burning but had thought it was due to seasonal allergies. Turns out that it all cleared up as soon as I stopped using this emu oil. I was surprised as the other brand of emu oil I used on my face all the time and even when used immediately after a skin peel, it never bothered me. It actually seemed to soothe the skin rather than irritate. I will be switching back to my old emu oil.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consistent high quality emu oil!
customer_reviews.text: I did lots of research to find the best emu oil. It had to be from the best source, processed the best without destroying any natural nutrients, without contaminants, shipped in a fresh state, good viscosity, and in a bottle that would help protect the product from the environment. This fit the bill, so I tried it. Upon first try, I loved it. It has continued to perform as stated. I have ordered many times since then (I always keep one in the refrigerator so that when the current bottle I use is empty I have an immediate backup). I trust this company and would order any of their products.
customer_reviews.author: jjtotheworld

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I really love this. Its top quality. I use to moisturize after chemical peel and it really helps. Incredible oil that ill always have in my cabinet (well refrigerator becouz thats where i store it)
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping. 1st time for using Emu oil, but it does absorb quickly and softens
customer_reviews.author: nita

customer_reviews.title: BEST TREATMENT FOR ECZEMA!!!!
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST PRODUCT FOR ECZEMA! MY DAUGHTER'S FLARE UP DIMINISHED WITHIN A FEW DAYS, ONCE THIS OIL WAS APPLIED. SHE APPLIES IT DAILY IN THE AREA STILL, AND THERE HAS NOT BEEN ANOTHER FLARE UP SINCE. THIS PRODUCT IS WELL WORTH THE PURCHASE. THANK YOU FOR MAKING YOUR PRODUCT WORTHY!
customer_reviews.author: The Mother Bug

customer_reviews.title: I feel a little odd as a vegetarian using an ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel a little odd as a vegetarian using an oil derived from emu lard, but I cannot deny the benefits of using it. It's a light oil that absorbs quickly and it has made a big difference in the eczema I have on my hands. It's the first product I've found that actually helps heal the dry, ragged skin. And I've tried it all, from raw Shea, to essential oils, to countless pharma products.
customer_reviews.author: K. Aaron Vanoosterhout

customer_reviews.title: I am writing about the 100% Emu Oil that I ordered
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a bottle of the Emu Oil 100% pure and it is everything that they say it is. I am very satisfied with this oil and I would recommend it to all my family and friends and tell them how good it is and that I would buy it again. Cathy
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: I like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I does work for rosacea and eczema and I may get it again but I am using almond oil and it is working. I think emu oil works a little better than almond oil, but right now its not in my budget. It does last a long time it will out last the expiration date on the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: J. B.

customer_reviews.title: Waiting to see
customer_reviews.text: Didnt really see the change. Probably need to use it a bit longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dramatic Skin Healing
customer_reviews.text: After using this oil only once my husband's severely chapped, injured thumb looked almost as good as the healthy one the next morning. It had previously looked so bad that I told him to return to his physician for further consult. His injury was so bad that the nail had lifted from the nail bed. Now a new nail is growing in and FAST! He no longer complains of irritation and he was so pleased with the results as was I. I am using it for hairloss as well and it has given me positiive results so far. I will be repurchasing when i get low on my current supply.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy491

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: this stuff has made such a difference in my skin and hair. my skin was looking dull and this has brought a glow to it that people keep complimenting me on. my hair was fried from highlights and this has brought life back into it, making it shiny and stopped the breakage. I will buy another bottle for my body. love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: mclachli

customer_reviews.title: This Emu oil is nice and seems to be good quality
customer_reviews.text: This Emu oil is nice and seems to be good quality. I previously ordered a different brand and this brand seems comparable and also the oil does not have any scent so you don't have to worry if you have any kind of allergy as I do. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: KDG

customer_reviews.title: I love that it has no odor and doesn't have to be refrigerated thanks for a 100% pure oil
customer_reviews.text: This oil is awesome works great on your pet's dry itchy skin as well I will definitely purchase it again!
customer_reviews.author: velenda w.

customer_reviews.title: A great.
customer_reviews.text: This emu oil is helping my hair to grow back in.
customer_reviews.author: Naomi Strother

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Works as it is supposed to...color etc was right on point.
customer_reviews.author: g k

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this oil very much. I use for a moisturizer every night. I will buy again,
customer_reviews.author: Miss Sunday

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy with the product
customer_reviews.text: The bottle was only half full, once it arrived. I have not seen any changes in skin.
customer_reviews.author: Torkwase adom

customer_reviews.title: All purpose product for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased emu oil to try it and because I hear positive reviews for it. I have used it to moisturize dry skin, or sore joints, it's stimulates the scalp during the anagen phase of growth. I don't expect it to grow my hair overnight,but I love how it moisturizes my scalp,and I use a little on my ends before blowdrying. It's clear,and odorless-make sure to shake it before using,and use sparingly.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Williamsen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Emu oil is amazing! It has helped with my inflammation! Its great for skin and hair!
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Lee

customer_reviews.title: The bottle of emu oil has a bit of strong smell
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this oil on my skin for quite a while now and loved it. This time however, I receive a batch that has a bit of strong smell to it. All previous purchases were almost odorless. I don't know if this will have an effect on the efficacy of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Belladonna

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I read previous reviews and tried this out, under my eyes - which were getting a little crepey. This kept them moisturized and seemed to soften the lines. I used it on the rest of my face and didn't break out. I haven't tried it in my hair yet. The smell is decent.
customer_reviews.author: Rice-a-Roni

customer_reviews.title: Great for stretchmarks!
customer_reviews.text: I had a baby 2 yrs ago and was left with stretchmarks, not nasty purple ones but still visible. I've been using this product for 1 1/2 months now after the shower and the results are better than expected. It doesn't smell good but who cares, the point is to make these scars less visible even if u or others have to put up with the smell. dont worry its not that bad. conclusion, it definitely works! I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Charleze

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like that it doesn’t have a scent. I love it and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Didn't cause any damage to my hair
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Didn't cause any damage to my hair, and I didn't notice any hair growth. Not too oily and didn't smell. I would buy again, but not necessary, can find equivalent product for lesser price. That's why I gave it a 4 star rating
customer_reviews.author: bap100pc

customer_reviews.title: No need for more expensive moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: Great for keeping older facial skin from drying and wrinkling. I have used just a couple drops morning and night for two years and my face always looks moisturized. This absorbs into skin and never feels greasy. Great product, especially for the price compared to Argon oil.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Maus

customer_reviews.title: I have had no luck this healing anything
customer_reviews.text: I have had no luck this healing anything. Its thin and smells fine. I would prefer to buy oil in a glass container. Vitamin E from Jason works much better for healing than this for me. I wouldn't buy it again, maybe it works for other people better.
customer_reviews.author: Healing Cave Lady

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful and generous. I use it both on my skin and hair. I truly love it. Really helped my hair structure and makes your skin very soft. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Roz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin and hair. I used this brand of EMU oil and it keeps my hair and skin soft and moisturized. I also mixes well with other natural oils, almond, aloe etc
customer_reviews.author: AlesiaFL

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a remarkable product. It is high quality. Isn't a weird color or odor. Has nice consistency and no weird odor. Being that I use it on my face, it is very important there is no weird smells. I am 62 years old and find a real difference in the appearance of my face after using about a 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: grannylinda

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Fast arrival. Great for anti aging regimen, eczema, dry skin. I love this and I have tried other anti aging oils before. Love the consistency and absorbency. If you want to look young and itchless, buy this. Now.
customer_reviews.author: love2read

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my skin!
customer_reviews.text: This oil has been a God send for my skin! I've had acne prone since I was a teenager and this oil has evened out my skin tone and helped minimize breakouts. I use it morning and night as a moisturizer. I honestly bought it for my hair and skin and didn't see that big a difference with my hair but definitely noticed my skin was looking fabulous. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ChellyChelle

customer_reviews.title: Very quick service!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised how quickly Koru filled my order! Many thanks! I also love the product--this is my first foray into emu oil. It really seems to work well moisturizing my skin. In the morning my skin feels supple and not tight due to winter dryness. I'm also using it on my hair, which seems to slurp it up. I think this product is a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Laurin A. Griffith

customer_reviews.title: It does appear to lessen fine wrinkles too
customer_reviews.text: I bought this oil to help fade 'age spots'. I have been using it for about a month now, and the spots really don't seem much lighter. I do, however, see an improvement to my skin, it's soft, smooth and the dry bumps I had are almost gone. It does appear to lessen fine wrinkles too, just wish I could do away with the age spots.
customer_reviews.author: Vesta

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Eczema
customer_reviews.text: Just started using emu oil and so far it's calmed my eczema faster and better than prescription ointment. I use a tiny bit on my legs and they are no longer red or itchy. I'm so thankful this product exists. I plan to use it around my eyes as well to prevent wrinkles. From the reviews it seems like such a beneficially oil to help treat many ailments. Love and highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: NoraP

customer_reviews.title: Excellent..6th time purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I have been using EMU oil everyday for the past 3 months and I must say this is the most purest and highest quality you will find. I use it all over my body (including face) and a surgery scar (which healed very very nicely). I must admit this stuff is addicting once you find out how soft/smooth it makes your skin. I lift weights and sweat a lot and I never get acne on my face or shoulders anymore.
customer_reviews.author: T. Mako

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: I like the way this moisturizes without leaving a greasy sheen. I can't vouch for any of the claims that emu oil does, such as reducing wrinkles etc., however as a moisturizer it is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Roan M. Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and works great for dry skin and a rash.
customer_reviews.author: suzy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like how the oil, makes my ole bald head, soft, not as dry as it is usually.
customer_reviews.author: vark

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I heard so many wonderful things about this oil! I’ve been using it for more than months, every night, have not seen any results. On my hair! Won’t purchase it again!!
customer_reviews.author: Shahps

customer_reviews.title: this is amazing I have dry skin and it does last for ...
customer_reviews.text: this is amazing I have dry skin and it does last for many hours have been using for many months but the hair regrowth is bunk on me but I love this oil
customer_reviews.author: ken g

customer_reviews.title: Holy Grail of Healing Ointments
customer_reviews.text: This oil completely cleared my eczema! I still use it to maintain its clarity but even if I decide not too, my skin is still rash free. If I consume something allergic, I'll rub some of the oil on it and the next day...MAGIC!! A friend also dabbed some on a canker sore she felt coming and the Emu oil shut it DOWN! I'LL BE ORDERING MORE!
customer_reviews.author: TeeWan Nor

customer_reviews.title: not right oil for my hair/scalp
customer_reviews.text: I know this product is referred to as the "holy grail" of oil, but there's something about it that doesn't work for me. I'll stick with the castor, neem, vitamin e oils
customer_reviews.author: Angela R

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen much of a change on my stretchmarks since I started using the emu oil. Didn't expect a miracle -especially since my stretchmarks are old & white but from the reviews I read I expected improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Tmarie

customer_reviews.title: It's a really good moisterizer for my hair
customer_reviews.text: I'm an African-American, I have relaxed hair and I've been using it for a few weeks. It's a really good moisterizer for my hair, it makes it really soft, however I recommend to use it after you're done styling it with heat as a nice finish. I also was looking for something to thicken my edges and so far it's working.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Haven't seen any results.
customer_reviews.text: I was using this every night and yet to see any results on my edges... Anyone know a better product to regrow your edges stronger?
customer_reviews.author: Kim Chav.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this product on my hair and my face. My hair is so much softer and more manageable. I use this oilon my face in place of my moisturizer before my make up and it makes a big difference!!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: Was told by a friend about this for the dark ...
customer_reviews.text: Was told by a friend about this for the dark marks in my face. I have seen a significant difference in my face and stretch marks.
customer_reviews.author: Andranique Mercier

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I use it for my moisturizer have reordered several times. I live in Colorado where it is very dry. This stuff works. Will continue to use.
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Pure Emu Oil is a great product. I have been using it on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Pure Emu Oil is a great product. I have been using it on my skin and hair for several weeks and love it. I also have salt and pepper gray hair and using Emu Oil will slow down the gray which is great. I am so happy that I found out about this product and plan to continue to use it on a regular basis.
customer_reviews.author: 4June

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I've had pretty bad dry skin on my face this winter and this emu oil completely solved that problem. I put it on twice a day and my dry skin is completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Guyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Smooth
customer_reviews.text: This size goes far, I am really enjoying the feel of this on my skin, it sinks in quickly and has no smell to it. I do think it has improved the texture of my skin and has added to calming what wrinkles I have. I will continue to purchase this product and it is at a great price.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. I use it on my dry ends
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I use it on my dry ends, as a face oil, and to heal wounds.

customer_reviews.title: Product was delivered on time. I can tell a ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered on time. I can tell a difference after using a few weeks to help grow my edges back.

customer_reviews.title: This oil is just fantastic!! My husband uses it for his psoriasis ...
customer_reviews.text: This oil is just fantastic!! My husband uses it for his psoriasis and it has been helping to clear it up. This oil has done wonders for my skin. It helps clear up cuts, and helps heals my acne. A must have!

customer_reviews.title: I gave it a try.
customer_reviews.text: I brought this product based on the reviews. Unfortunately, it did not work for me. Will continue to use the product for I hate to waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommended by my Dr
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my Dr. to use during radiation for cancer. ( not recommended for all radiation depends on what/where you're getting it)I'm getting high doses of radiation and the emu oil is helping protect my skin and doing a wonderful job!!
customer_reviews.author: kehaines

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great moisturizer, especially with the weather we're having this winter (2017-18)
customer_reviews.author: Marisia

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a week or so now. Have been experimenting with TCA peels & lactic acid peels. So far I really like the benefits of it on my face. Didn't do a whole lot for my hair though. Only takes a drop for the face or it will get oily. Pretty happy with it so far. Have ordered macadamia nut oil for my hair.
customer_reviews.author: otismom

customer_reviews.title: Great uses
customer_reviews.text: I have Fibro, it has helped lessen pain in areas ( shoulders , neck ) . Great for the hair, my hair is dry and this helps with moisture, Works on scars removing the redness left by scar. I am going to keep using to help my pain and soften skin.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: this stuff REALLY does absorb easily and quickly
customer_reviews.text: Man, this stuff REALLY does absorb easily and quickly. I LOVE how it leaves my skin and hair feeling soft and smooth. Too bad it is a little on the expensive side. I will have to look at getting emu oil in bulk.
customer_reviews.author: Skeeter

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!!! Best kept secret when it comes to skin care.
customer_reviews.author: Decimate

customer_reviews.title: Try it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters and myself all have sensitive skin. This stuff is like magic. It calms red irritated skin instantly. I use it on my face as a calming serum for my rosea prone skin. I'm on my fourth bottle of this stuff and have no plans of ever stopping.
customer_reviews.author: MamacitaBonita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stretch marks are definitely less visible in the month of using this oil

customer_reviews.text: I have never had moisturizer for my face that does not contain retion. This actually is accepted by my skin and absorbed. I have eczema, oily skin and badacne
customer_reviews.author: a

customer_reviews.title: Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I use this a lot. It is a fantastic moisturizer and will make your skin glow. My suggestion is exfoliate in moderation and you will get even better benefits from this.
customer_reviews.author: Glyph

customer_reviews.title: Liquid Gold
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd order of Emu Oil, I use it all over my body ! So many benefits, using it in my hair makes it softer and look healthier, using it on my skin makes it softer and more radiant. I use it at night under my eyes and mix it with my bath water, I had an appendix surgery and put the emu oil on my scar and it started to fade ! I cant say enough about how awesome this product is. I am a firm believer in Emu Oil love it !
customer_reviews.author: Lori G

customer_reviews.title: Good for burns
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is good for burns - as my grandmother says... So I purchased her this bottle.
customer_reviews.author: LRobb

product_meta.title: Emu Oil Pure Premium Golden 4 Ounces
feature_bullets: All natural Emu Oil with no additives of any kind. Produced in the U.S. from emus raised on American farms under contract to ensure that only the highest standards of health and safety are used. No antibiotics, hormones, or chemicals

Batches produced monthly to ensure freshness. Each batch analyzed at an independent laboratory for compliance with international standards for pure emu oil. Our emu oil is almost white, and has a rich, thick consistency. Odor ranges from undetectable to low, depending on time of the year. If some odor is detected it will dissipate quickly upon application.
Use to fight dryness, itching, sore muscles, and aching joints, and as powerful skin and hair moisturizing antiaging oil with anti blemish and anti wrinkle actions
Watch for adulteration, common with emu oil. A yellow to brown color should be a warning sign, and sellers should provide analytical data and certificates of analysis showing that the product is pure
Our customers report better results with our fully refined emu oil than with many expensive creams, lotions, and balms
